data.eml:eml: Revision of the family Nothybidae (Diptera: Schizophora)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lonsdale, O., Marshall, S. A. (2016): Revision of the family Nothybidae (Diptera: Schizophora). Zootaxa 4098 (1): 1-42, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4098.1.1
